mapper.select: SELECT a.no AS no, a.user_no AS userNo, a.title AS title, b.name AS name, a.content AS content, a.hit AS hit, a.reg_date AS regDate, a.group_no as proupNo, a.order_no as orderNo, a.depth as depth from rboard a join users b on a.user_no = b.no order by a.no desc
mapper.insert: insert into rboard ( no, user_no, title, content, group_no, order_no, depth ) values ( seq_rboard_no.nextval , #{userNo}, #{title}, #{content}, seq_rboard_no.nextval , 1, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT a.no, a.user_no as userNo, a.title, b.name, a.content, a.hit, a.reg_date as regDate, a.group_no as groupNo, a.order_no as orderNo, a.depth as depth FROM rboard a JOIN users b ON a.user_no = b.no WHERE a.no = #{no}
